Active noise cancelling headphones dr dre beats build use of a small microphone to pickup ambient noise. This signal is processed by some very clever electronics where it's inverted and summed with the audio signal being delivered to your ears. The end effect is that the background noise is cancelled out. Sound isolating headphones achieve a similar effect to noise cancelling headphones, however they do not use any electronics and instead block external sounds by sealing within your ear. Noise cancelling headphones are significantly smart at blocking out low frequency sounds, like the low-finish rumble created within an airplane cabin, however aren't thus good at eliminating inconsistent, higher frequency background sounds.
